Module main
Package com.vtuberrush.src.managers

Class UnitManager

java.lang.Object
com.vtuberrush.src.managers.UnitManager
public class UnitManager extends Object
Facilitates the rendering, targeting, placing, deleting and other methods related to interacting with units.
Version:
0.0.1-alpha.1
Author:
Gio Carlo Ciudadano

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    UnitManager​(Playing playing)
    Initializes the list of units and unit effects.

  • Constructor Details

    • UnitManager

      public UnitManager​(Playing playing)
      Initializes the list of units and unit effects. Created when initializing the PLAYING game state.
      Parameters:
      playing - - Defines the specific instance of the scene where the unit manager is initialized.
      See Also:
      loadEffects(), loadUnits()

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Updates all units on the field and checks if the unit is ready to attack an enemy or buff an ally (Rosemi).

    • isNearby

      public boolean isNearby​(Unit unit, Enemy enemy)
      Uses the distance formula to check if the enemy can be attacked.
      Parameters:
      unit - - The unit that is attempting to attack the enemy.
      enemy - - The enemy being attacked.
      Returns:
      true - The enemy is within range of the passed unit.

    • draw

      public void draw​(Graphics graphics)
      Renders all placed units and their effects to the playing field.
      Parameters:
      graphics - - Responsible for drawing objects to the screen.

    • addUnit

      public void addUnit​(Unit unit, int x, int y)
      Places a new unit.
      Parameters:
      unit - - The unit being placed.
      x - - Defines the horizontal position of the unit from the left of the window in pixels rounded to the nearest tile.
      y - - Defines the vertical position of the unit from the top of the window in pixels rounded to the nearest tile.

    • removeUnit

      public void removeUnit​(Unit unit)
      Removes the unit.
      Parameters:
      unit - - The unit being removed.

    • upgradeUnit

      public void upgradeUnit​(Unit unit)
      Increments the level of the selected unit by one.
      Parameters:
      unit - - The unit being upgraded.

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Clears all units in the field.
      Called during a game over or game complete condition.

    • getUnitSprites

      public BufferedImage[] getUnitSprites()
      Returns the image atlas of the unit sprites (playing field).
      Returns:
      unitSprites

    • getUnitIcons

      public BufferedImage[] getUnitIcons()
      Returns the image atlas of the unit icons (action bar).
      Returns:
      unitIcons

    • getUnitAt

      public Unit getUnitAt​(int x, int y)
      Returns the unit in the clicked location in the playing field, if it exists.
      Returns null if the location did not have any unit.
      Parameters:
      x - - Defines the horizontal position of the unit from the left of the window in pixels rounded to the nearest tile.
      y - - Defines the vertical position of the unit from the top of the window in pixels rounded to the nearest tile.
      Returns:
      unit - The unit being selected in the playing field, if it exists.
